pages.text: The $(mob)Goblin$() is a neutral monster that spawns on the surface in Savannas in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is passive and does not attack players unless provoked, at which point it engages in melee. $(mob)Goblins$() may spawn with wooden weapons and occasionally a $(mob)Goblin$() may spawn as a $(mob)Goblin Sapper$(), equipped with a powder keg and $(item)Bombs$(), which they throw at medium range in combat to attack.
$(mob)Goblins$() drop $(item)Iron Nuggets$() on death, which can be combined to make $(item)Iron Ingots$().
$(mob)Goblins$() drop $(item)Meat$() on death, which serves as a decent source of food.
